targets.query: SELECT last("passing") AS unsealed FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."consul_health_checks" WHERE role='vault-server' AND check_name='Vault Sealed Status' GROUP BY "check_id"

SELECT max("usage_user") AS "user_cpu", max("usage_iowait") AS "iowait_cpu" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE ("role" = 'vault-server' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(max("read_bytes")) + non_negative_difference(max("write_bytes")) AS "bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."diskio" WHERE ("role" = 'vault-server' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter"  =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_difference(max("bytes_recv")) + non_negative_difference(max("bytes_sent")) AS "bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."net" WHERE ("role" = 'vault-server' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") AS "count" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.core.handle_request" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='consul-server' GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" FILL(null)

SELECT max("value") AS "alloc_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.runtime.alloc_bytes" WHERE ("role" = 'vault-server' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(0)

SELECT max("value") AS "sys_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.runtime.sys_bytes" WHERE ("role" = 'vault-server' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(0)

SELECT mean("total") AS "total_bytes" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/ AND "role" = 'vault-server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.get" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.get" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.put" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.put" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT last("upper")/1000000 AS "milliseconds" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.runtime.gc_pause_ns" WHERE $timeFilter AND "role"='vault-server' GROUP BY host, time($__interval) FILL(0)
SELECT mean("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.list" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("mean") FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.list" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT mean("90_percentile") AS "90_percentile" FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.consul.delete" WHERE "datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT max("upper") FROM "telegraf"."autogen"."vault.core.leadership_lost" WHERE ("datacenter" =~ /^$dc$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values on telegraf from cpu with key = "host" where role = 'vault-server'

list.label: Datacenter
list.name: dc
list.query: show tag values on telegraf from cpu with key = "datacenter" where role = 'vault-server'
